title: [BUG] undefined symbol exception thrown in linux ARM-64
body:
### Description

We are using SkiaSharp for rendering purposes and are currently facing an exception on the Linux ARM64 platform due to an upgrade from version 3.11.6 to 3.119.1. Initially, we encountered the following issue:

`dotnet: symbol lookup error: /app/runtimes/linux-arm64/native/libSkiaSharp.so: undefined symbol: FT_Get_BDF_Property`

After finding a temporary solution, the following exception was thrown, which we cannot resolve. This issue specifically occurs on the Linux ARM64 platform:

`undefined symbol: uuid_generate_random`

### Code

-

### Expected Behavior

Processes without exception in linux arm64 platform.

### Actual Behavior

exception thrown.

### Version of SkiaSharp

3.118.0-preview.2 (Next Preview)

### Last Known Good Version of SkiaSharp

3.116.0 (Current)

### IDE / Editor

Visual Studio (Windows)

### Platform / Operating System

Linux

### Platform / Operating System Version

_No response_

### Devices

_No response_

### Relevant Screenshots

_No response_

This issue is not explicitly labeled as a regression, but it does pertain to a compatibility problem following an upgrade.

Additional remarks:
